service.title: Our Services
service.subtitle: We provide the services of a crane operator, a tow truck operator, and offer equipment for various works to meet all your needs.

service1.title: Crane Operator
service1.subtitle: Our experienced crane operators are available for all types of lifting and construction needs.

service2.title: Tow Truck Operator
service2.subtitle: Reliable tow truck services available 24/7 to assist you in any situation.

service3.title: Equipment Rental
service3.subtitle: We provide high-quality equipment for various works, ensuring your projects run smoothly.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a transportation company offering various services including tow trucks, manipulators, taps, tractors, Truck, and drilling rigs.

tow.title: Tow Truck
tow.subtitle: Our tow truck service is reliable and available 24/7. We have a fleet of modern tow trucks to assist you.

manipulator.title: Manipulator
manipulator.subtitle: Our manipulators are perfect for lifting and transporting heavy loads with precision and safety.

tap.title: Tap
tap.subtitle: Our tap services ensure a steady and reliable supply for all your needs, with high-quality equipment.

tractor.title: Tractor
tractor.subtitle: Our tractor services are ideal for agricultural, construction, and landscaping projects, providing power and efficiency.

truck.title: Truck
truck.subtitle: Our Truck trucks are reliable and versatile, suitable for various transport needs.

drill.title: Drilling Rig
drill.subtitle: Our drilling rigs are equipped with the latest technology for efficient and precise drilling operations.
